titleStmt.title: A manuel of the Bibles doctrine for law and Gospell, letter and spirit, signe and thing signified reduced to the first chapter of Leuiticus: Wherewith (occasionally) be plainely considered, and briefelie concluded, the most mayne questions wherewith the christian churches be combied. By H.C.
titleStmt.author: Clapham, Henoch.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R. B[radock] for Nathaniell Butter, and are to be sold at his shop neere saint Austens gate,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.

place.placeName: his shop neere saint Austens gate
